mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(exam_ymd, 1, 4) as year FROM csat_exam WHERE rating_cut_public_yn = 'Y' AND ys_seq = #{yearStudentSequence} GROUP BY year ORDER BY exam_ymd desc

SELECT ce.exam_seq, DATE_FORMAT(ce.exam_ymd, '%Y') AS year,ce.exam_name,ci.isttt_name,ce.ys_seq FROM csat_exam ce,csat_isttt ci WHERE ce.isttt_seq = ci.isttt_seq AND ce.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} ORDER BY ce.exam_seq desc
